title: The Wrong Side of Kai
description: "Vanessa doesn’t believe in serious relationships. Come to think of it, she doesn’t believe in any kind of relationship. But when her casual fling with Harrison ends in the ultimate betrayal, she’s out for revenge.A leaked video that’s got everyone talking. A mysterious (and hot) new guy at school.A payback plan. What could go wrong? And what might go right?The Wrong Side of Kai is a story of broken hearts, forgiveness, trust and vulnerability – and the breathtaking exhilaration of falling in love."
author: Estelle Maskame
